Acavna.areasOfConcern: Companionship, defensive battle, and the moon

Achaekek.areasOfConcern: Assassinations, divine punishment, the red mantis

Aesocar.areasOfConcern: Creation of life, health, and medicine

Anubis.areasOfConcern: Burial, the dead, funeral rites, mummification, tombs

Aroden.areasOfConcern: Humanity, innovation, history, culture, and fulfillment of destiny

Braismois.areasOfConcern: Broken deals, fine print, unfair bargains

Ceyannan.areasOfConcern: Final words, lost souls, and searches

Corosbel.areasOfConcern: Failed martyrdom, false worship, ritual death

Hathor.areasOfConcern: Dance, joy, love, music, the sky

Il'surrish.areasOfConcern: Formlessness, loss of control, and potential

Isph-Aun-Vuln.areasOfConcern: Infestation of the flesh, poisonous wind

Kabriri.areasOfConcern: Ghouls, graves, secrets kept by the dead

Kelksiomides.areasOfConcern: Hero-god of gardens, orchards, and terraces

Lissala (pre-Earthfall).areasOfConcern: Duty, fate, reward for service, and runes

Mordiggian.areasOfConcern: Darkness, ghouls, voices of the dead

Nephthys.areasOfConcern: Mourning, night, protection of the dead

Shamira.areasOfConcern: Lost dreams, seduction of the pure

Stygidvod.areasOfConcern: Fear of aging, radical routes to immortality, wills

The Pale Horse.areasOfConcern: Duty, revenge, and beasts of burden

Wadjet.areasOfConcern: Good serpents, the River Sphinx, wisdom

Ydajisk.areasOfConcern: Language evolution, lost words, and slang
